item.title: Privacy: Who Needs It? by Robert J. Sawyer
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

isn’t this {{{{{{{{{{ In other words, such monitoring and tracking is already going on to benefit big business. Why not take advantage of it to improve our own lives?}}}}}}}} the thesis???

btw to make sure is the tone convincing or persuade

Read full topic
item.source: Privacy: Who Needs It? by Robert J. Sawyer

item.title: Privacy: Who Needs It? by Robert J. Sawyer
item.dc:creator: @Square Square
item.description:
@Square wrote:

Pretty sure the first sentence is the Thesis, and i cba to read any of it to find out the tone. If you knew the definition of tone, you should be able to figure it out yourself.
